sense.gloss: set, suit, uniform collection, matching items
entirely, all, every one, nothing but
to collect, to gather, to get together, to complete (a collection)
to arrange, to put in order, to prepare, to get ready
to make uniform, to make even, to match
to be complete, to be all present, to make a full set, to be satisfied (of conditions)
to be equal, to be uniform, to be even, to match, to agree
to gather, to assemble, to be collected
assembling (in full force), muster, lining up, gathering, getting together

sdata.j: みなさまがお↑揃↑↓ぞろ↓いになったので、↑送別↑↓そうべつ↓↑会↑↓かい↓を↑始↑↓はじ↓められます。
sdata.e: Now that we are all here, we can start the farewell party.

sdata.j: そのアパートはビクトリア↑朝風↑↓ちょうふう↓の↑家具↑↓かぐ↓を↑揃↑↓そろ↓えてあった。
sdata.e: The apartment was furnished in the Victorian style.

sdata.j: ↑証拠↑↓しょうこ↓は↑揃↑↓そろ↓った。アリバイがないことを↑合↑↓あ↓わせて↑考↑↓かんが↓えると、↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑犯人↑↓はんにん↓に↑違↑↓ちが↓いない。
sdata.e: The evidence is laid out before us. Considering that, together with the fact that he has no alibi, there's no question that he's the guilty one.

sdata.j: ↑大会↑↓たいかい↓↑９日↑↓ここのか↓↑目↑↓め↓、ベスト↑８↑↓えいと↓が↑出揃↑↓でそろ↓った。
sdata.e: The top eight players survived the ninth day of the tournament.

sdata.j: この↑商店↑↓しょうてん↓↑街↑↓がい↓は↑地元↑↓じもと↓では↑唯一↑↓ゆいいつ↓のショッピング↑街↑↓がい↓で、↑日↑↓にち↓↑用品↑↓ようひん↓から↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓に↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓なものまで↑一↑↓ひと↓↑通↑↓とお↓り↑揃↑↓そろ↓ってしまう。
sdata.e: This shopping district is the only high street in the local area; it stocks the whole line-up from products for daily life to school study equipment.

sdata.j: ↑偽造↑↓ぎぞう↓カードと↑暗証↑↓あんしょう↓↑番号↑↓ばんごう↓が↑揃↑↓そろ↓えば、↑口座↑↓こうざ↓にある↑限↑↓かぎ↓りの↑現金↑↓げんきん↓が↑引↑↓ひ↓き↑出↑↓だ↓されてしまう。
sdata.e: If they can get both a forged card and its PIN then all the cash in the bank account will be withdrawn.

sdata.j: インコを↑飼↑↓か↓うために↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓なものを↑揃↑↓そろ↓えましょう。
sdata.e: Let's get what we need to keep a parrot.

sdata.j: ↑道具↑↓どうぐ↓としての↑実需↑↓じつじゅ↓がないから↑品↑↓ひん↓↑揃↑↓そろ↓えに↑深↑↓ふか↓みがでない。
sdata.e: There's no demand for them as tools, so the product line-up is poor.

sdata.j: ↑今度↑↓こんど↓の↑新入↑↓しんにゅう↓↑社員↑↓しゃいん↓は↑揃↑↓そろ↓いも↑揃↑↓そろ↓って↑注意↑↓ちゅうい↓↑力↑↓りょく↓が↑散漫↑↓さんまん↓で、↑仕事↑↓しごと↓がミスだらけで↑全↑↓まった↓く↑閉口↑↓へいこう↓する。
sdata.e: This year's freshly inducted employees are, to a man, lacking in concentration, and their sloppy work leaves me speechless.

sdata.j: ↑靴↑↓くつ↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓いだらきちっと↑揃↑↓そろ↓えておきなさい。
sdata.e: If you are taking your shoes off, please put them in their place.

words.gloss: set, suit, uniform collection, matching items
to collect, to gather, to get together, to complete (a collection)
